Title.Language: Doxology for St. Gregory the Theologian

Comment.Language: For the Commemoration of St. Gregory the Theologian:

Text.Language: Gregory of Nazianzus: O great shepherd: the luminous pillar: of the Orthodox people.
O great Archbishop: of Constantinople: you authored the liturgy: with the sweetness of your words.
His father, a bishop: by heresies was led astray: but returned to the true faith: through his son, Saint Gregory.
With your holy sayings: concerning the Trinity: you rebuked the heretics: and corrected their false teachings.
Blessed are you indeed: our holy father the patriarch: Abba Gregory the Theologian: the beloved of Christ.
